30a. Tanaka-kun-wa[Mary-ga doko-de dono hono-o katta]-ka sitte-imasu ka
Tanaka -TOP Mary-NOM where which book-ACC bought Q know Q
"Does Tanako know where Mary bought which book?"
*"For which book x, does Tanako know where Mary bought x?"
